scripts.__all: concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "TypescriptCompiler,carsApi,countriesApi" -c "red.bold,blue.bold,yellow.bold," "npm run build" "npm run run_app1" "npm run run_app2"
scripts.all: concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "carsApi,countriesApi,buildCarsApi" -c "red.bold,blue.bold,yellow.bold," "npm run run_app1" "npm run run_app2" "npm run build"
